teacher_info.intro:
Hello! My name is Anastasia. I was born in Siberia, but have been living in Moscow for 7 years. I am a Russian native speaker and a qualified teacher of Russian as foreign language.
I like reading, watching movies, travelling in Russia and abroad. History, architecture, cooking and foreign languages (English, German and French) are also among my interests.
teacher_info.about_me:
Hello! My name is Anastasia. I was born in Siberia, but have been living in Moscow for 7 years. I am a Russian native speaker and a qualified teacher of Russian as foreign language.
I like reading, watching movies, travelling in Russia and abroad. History, architecture, cooking and foreign languages (English, German and French) are also among my interests.
teacher_info.about_teacher:
I have a Master's degree in Teaching Russian as Foreign language and 2 years of experience of working with international students. I have been working at the pre-year courses by one of the Moscow universities with big and small groups of international students and teaching them from zero to B1 level and higher. I also have worked with individual students. 
I really enjoy my job. Teaching Russian is a great experience for me, it allows me not only to communicate with people from all over the world, but also to see my native language from the another point of view. It's very inspiring.
teacher_info.teaching_style:
I base my lessons on communicative method and try to speak only Russian during the lesson, but I am always ready to help you in English or German if you need it. 
I prefer to explain grammar rules on the basis of authentic texts , dialogues and other materials. We will speak, listen and write a lot. All my tasks are inspired by the situations from the real life: from making an order in a restaurant to job interview or presentation of your startup.
For B1-C2 students and heritage speakers I also offer discussion lessons with the focus on vocabulary.

edu_info.institution: National Research University "Higher School of Economics"
National Research University "Higher School of Economics"

cert_info.description: The document certifies that I finished 36-hour course "TORFL: features of preparing students to the tests" and ready for working with the students who want to pass any level of TORFL test.
cert_info.certificate: Certificate in Preparation for TORFL exams

course_info.trial_description:
During the Trial Lesson, we will get to know each other and discuss your goals.
If you are a beginner, we can start with Russian greetings or alphabet. You will learn a little bit of Russian by the end of the class!
If you already have some experience with Russian, the main goal of the Trial lesson - to determine your level. It can be a free discussion or I can prepare materials that will let you remember your knowledge of Russian and show your skills.

pro_course_detail.title: General Russian
pro_course_detail.description:
Well-structured and prepared lessons. 
You will learn to express yourself in grammatically correct Russian. Every lesson you will be able to practice Speaking, Reading, Listening and Writing, expand your vocabulary and learn something new about grammar.
Course is based on the best Russian textbooks and original materials, that I choose for each student individually.

pro_course_detail.title: Russian Conversation Practice
pro_course_detail.description:
This course will allow you to improve your speaking skills. Every lesson, we will discuss some interesting topic. To start a discussion we will use a variety of texts, videos, and other materials that match your level. 
Discussions will help you to expand your vocabulary. We can also revise some grammar, that is needed to express your ideas on the topic, but it's not the main goal of the course.

This course is suitable only for students who already knows basic Russian (can conjugate verbs and decline nouns and adjectives).

pro_course_detail.title: TORFL (ТРКИ) Preparation
pro_course_detail.description: These summer I have taken a course about preparation for the TORFL exams (waiting for the certificate to upload) and I am glad to offer you this type of lessons! During these lessons we will discuss the structure of the TORFL and practice the parts of the exam that are difficult for you. Lessons are based on the official test materials and books.

pro_course_detail.title: Russian for bilinguals and heritage speakers (available for kids and teenagers)
pro_course_detail.description:
These lessons are designed for adults, teenagers and children over 10 years old who speaks Russian at home, with parents or relatives, but lives abroad and has any kind of difficulties with the Russian language. I prepare an individual program for every student: you can learn to read and write cyrillic letters, work out Russian grammar, enrich you vocabulary or even learn Russian spelling, punctuation and classic literature according to the program of Russian schools.

Sorry, I do NOT work with the children under 10 years old.

teacher_info.intro:
Привет!

Меня зовут Вероника, и я преподаю русский язык. Я живу в Москве. 
Я закончила институт факультет "Международные отношения", а это значит, что я люблю изучать языки.
teacher_info.about_me:
Привет!

Меня зовут Вероника, и я преподаю русский язык. Я живу в Москве. 
Я закончила институт факультет "Международные отношения", а это значит, что я люблю изучать языки.
teacher_info.about_teacher: Мне нравиться давать людям возможности и инструменты для того, чтобы они преуспели в своей цели. Я хотела бы быть полезной, а для этого нужно правильно услышать человека, который в этой пользе нуждается.
teacher_info.teaching_style:
Я работаю онлайн на этой платформе, а также использую дополнительные технические средства, которые помогут сделать урок интересным. 

На первой встрече мы обговариваем запрос, проводим тщательный анализ потребностей и вместе определяем формат работы (по учебнику или без него, с домашними заданиями или без), структуру курса и, возможно, дополнительные материалы. 

На каждого студента я завожу отдельный документ, где мы вместе записываем новые слова и выражения. Для каждого ученика я составляю индивидуальное домашнее задание.
На уроках мы часто обсуждаем актуальные события в мире, спорим на интересные темы, делимся своим мнением.

course_info.trial_description: Пробное занятие служит для того, чтобы понять, подходит ли преподавать ученику. На первой встрече мы знакомимся и обсуждаем цели на дальнейшее обучение.

pro_course_detail.title: General Russian
pro_course_detail.description: During this course you will study Russian grammar, vocabulary, pronunciation and also you will practise speaking skills.

pro_course_detail.title: Conversation Practice - All Levels
pro_course_detail.description:
Enjoy improving your conversation skills!
The most crucial part of any language learning is Practice! We can talk about Russia. What do you want to know about Russia? Do you watch movies, TV shows, read books, travel, play sports? We'll find something to talk about.

teacher_info.intro: Hello! My name is Vera. I'm a native Russian speaker. I live in Moscow. I teach English as a foreign language. I've been teaching English to adults and kids for about 8 years. I teach Russian as a foreign language as well. I have certificates as a teacher of English, such as a diploma of higher pedagogical education and TKT certificate for teachers. I've recently obtained IELTS certificate.
teacher_info.short_signature: Experienced English teacher with IELTS and CAE certificates
teacher_info.about_me: Hello! My name is Vera. I'm a native Russian speaker. I live in Moscow. I teach English as a foreign language. I've been teaching English to adults and kids for about 8 years. I teach Russian as a foreign language as well. I have certificates as a teacher of English, such as a diploma of higher pedagogical education and TKT certificate for teachers. I've recently obtained IELTS certificate.
teacher_info.about_teacher: I teach and learn languages myself, so I know how challenging and exciting it might be to learn a new language. My attitude towards students is always friendly and supportive. I really want them to build their confinedce in a language, enjoy learning process and integrate language learning into their daily life.
teacher_info.teaching_style: I prefer using modern courebooks, various entertaining games, authentic audio and video for my classes. My students improve their pronunciation, learn and practise vocabulary and grammar. I stick to individual approach and do my best to help students to reach their goals. I will gladly share my knowledge of the Russian language as well as of the English language. See you in my class!

course_info.trial_description: We are going to get to know each other better, discuss your learning goals and preferences. After this lesson we'll choose a couse book or other sources to use in our classes. I'll build a study plan for you. See you in my class!

pro_course_detail.title: General Russian for Loyal Students only levels A1, A2, B1 (structured lessons) (English - mediator language)
pro_course_detail.description: This type of lesson is based on a course book according to your level. I'll help you to improve your pronunciation, enlarge your vocabulary and learn grammar. You'll develop different language skills such as speaking, listening, reading and writing. We'll use various sources and games in the lessons for them to be more authentic and engaging. I give Russian lessons for kids (staring from 10 years old), teenagers and adults. See you in my class!

pro_course_detail.title: Speaking practice in Russian for levels A2, B1, B2
pro_course_detail.description: We are going to focus on developing your speaking skills. My classes are usually customized, so you need to either inform me ahead of the preferred topics you want to discuss or I could choose them to my own liking. My favorite topics are learning and teaching foreign languages, painting/drawing, literature, movies, music, travelling and others. We can use different sources such as videos, podcasts and articles as well as using course book materials.

pro_course_detail.title: General English for beginners and pre-intermediate, intermediate level students only - levels A1, A2, B1  (structured lessons) (Russian - mediator language)
pro_course_detail.description: This type of lesson is based on a course book according to your level. I'll help you with your pronunciation, vocabulary and grammar. You'll develop different language skills such as speaking, listening, reading and writing. We'll use various sources and games in the lessons for them to be more authentic and engaging. I give English lessons for kids (staring from 10 years old), teenagers and adults. See you in my class!

teacher_info.intro:
🌻Hi! 
My name is Sabina. I'm from Russia. I have been learning foreign languages for 7 years already and I find it very exciting because you can easily dive in new cultures, meet new people and it gives you a lot of opportunities in life! :)

Привет! 
Меня зовут Сабина. Я из России. Я учу иностранные языки уже 7 лет и получаю от этого большое удовольствие. Изучая новые языки появляется очень много новых возможностей, знакомств и получается по-настоящему узнать незнакомую тебе культуру другой страны! :)
teacher_info.about_me:
🌻Hi! 
My name is Sabina. I'm from Russia. I have been learning foreign languages for 7 years already and I find it very exciting because you can easily dive in new cultures, meet new people and it gives you a lot of opportunities in life! :)

Привет! 
Меня зовут Сабина. Я из России. Я учу иностранные языки уже 7 лет и получаю от этого большое удовольствие. Изучая новые языки появляется очень много новых возможностей, знакомств и получается по-настоящему узнать незнакомую тебе культуру другой страны! :)
teacher_info.about_teacher:
🌻As a teacher i promise to make the most for you to have a comfortable and intresting expirience. I promise to be tolerant, patient and caring. 
I will adjust to your speed and needs. We all different and that's what makes us unique!

Как учитель, я обещаю сделать всё, чтобы процесс изучения был комфортными и интересным. Я буду заботливой и внимательной, потому что тоже учу языки и очень хорошо вас понимаю во многих аспектах.
У нас у всех свой темп и нам подходят разные техники, но я помогу вам найти наиболее эффективные для вас!
teacher_info.teaching_style:
🌻I believe that learning could and should be fun. I will help you to break language barriers and start talking, reading and writing.
We can discuss different topics, use texts and examine what is important to you.  During our lessons we will improve your pronunciation, speaking skills and extand your vocabulary.
See you online! :)


Я верю что учебный процесс может быть и должен быть увлекательным. Я помогу вас разобраться со всеми барьерами и начать говорить, писать и читать.
Мы будем обсуждать разные темы, использовать текстовые материалы и разбираться в том, что для вас важно. Так мы улучшим ваши навыки и вы начнёте понимать и использовать язык.
Увидимся на уроке! :)

course_info.trial_description:
This lesson is a great way to get to know each other! 
We can discuss your further goals, set up a learning plan or just chat a little bit about learning process.

pro_course_detail.title: Russian for any level.
pro_course_detail.description:
Lessons are based on your personal needs and level of Russian (speaking, reading, writing).
We can friendly discuss different topics while effortlessly expanding your vocabulary and improving pronunciation. I will help you with everything that seems difficult.

teacher_info.intro:
My name is Karina, I am 26 years old. I was born in Ukraine but I grew up and spent many years in Moscow, Russia. Last 5 years I lived in the Luhansk region, Ukraine. Now I'm currently in Spain.
In my free time, I enjoy reading, having strength trainings and spending time with my friends.
teacher_info.short_signature: Linguist with over 3 years of teaching experience
teacher_info.about_me:
My name is Karina, I am 26 years old. I was born in Ukraine but I grew up and spent many years in Moscow, Russia. Last 5 years I lived in the Luhansk region, Ukraine. Now I'm currently in Spain.
In my free time, I enjoy reading, having strength trainings and spending time with my friends.
teacher_info.about_teacher:
I have a bachelor's degree in linguistics, which means I know the way languages work and how to deal with them. I have been teaching English for over 3 years and Russian for 9 months so far. 
Currently, I am studying to get an international certificate for teachers.
teacher_info.teaching_style:
I teach general Russian. 
In my lessons, I pay a lot of attention to speaking and listening practices because they are the most difficult and always need more time for a student to make progress.

I take my lessons and time seriously. And I expect my students to do the same. 
It is important for me that my students can feel comfortable during our lessons because I believe that learning a foreign language should be with pleasure.

My native language is Russian but also I speak English and Spanish a bit. 
Well, I know what it is like to learn a foreign language and what difficulties my students may face.

course_info.trial_description:
During this trial lesson, we get to know each other, talk about your experience (including your own difficulties) and goals for learning Russian.  I find out your language level. At the end of the lesson, we share our impressions and I give you some personal recommendations for your case.

I work with an individual approach for each of my students. That's important for me.

pro_course_detail.title: Russian speaking practice
pro_course_detail.description:
We will devote this lesson to improving your speaking skills.
During the lesson, I will help you with pronunciation, new vocabulary and expressions (including slang).

The purpose of this practice is not only to speak but also to feel comfortable for both you and me.

pro_course_detail.title: General Russian lessons
pro_course_detail.description:
We will devote this lesson to learning the basics of Russian.

There is a lot of speaking and listening as the most important and difficult but also grammar as an integral part of the Russian language.

* If you are interested in this kind of lesson and we haven't worked together before, we have to meet for a consultation ( a trial lesson ) to see each other and talk about your own situation, purpose to learn Russian, difficulties and other important things for me as a teacher.

I work with an individual approach for each of my students. That's important for me.

teacher_info.intro:
Hi! I am Irina. Thank you for researching my page. Russian is my native language, all the members of my family always were speaking Russian despite the fact I was born in Lithuania (unfortunately, Lithuanian is a foreign language for me). I live and work in Russia more that 30 years, mostly in Saint-Petersburg but also I used to live in Siberia. I am certain we will find the topics for some conversational practice easily because I have a wide range of interests and I’m a good listener and have lots of questions which help you to speak Russian more confident.
Je parle russe depuis que je suis né, c’est ma langue maternelle. J’aimerais t’aider à apprendre le russe.
teacher_info.about_me:
Hi! I am Irina. Thank you for researching my page. Russian is my native language, all the members of my family always were speaking Russian despite the fact I was born in Lithuania (unfortunately, Lithuanian is a foreign language for me). I live and work in Russia more that 30 years, mostly in Saint-Petersburg but also I used to live in Siberia. I am certain we will find the topics for some conversational practice easily because I have a wide range of interests and I’m a good listener and have lots of questions which help you to speak Russian more confident.
Je parle russe depuis que je suis né, c’est ma langue maternelle. J’aimerais t’aider à apprendre le russe.
teacher_info.about_teacher:
Hello, I love not only sharing my knowledge, but structuring it and adapting to each student. I’ll support you, explain different kinds of difficulties, and help you master your skills. 

Мне нравится не только делиться своими знаниями, но и структурировать их, анализировать, подбирать и адаптировать под каждого студента. Поддержу, объясню и помогу отработать навыки до автоматизма. 

J’aime non seulement partager mes connaissances, mais aussi les adapter à chaque élève. Je vous aiderai à maîtriser vos compétences.
teacher_info.teaching_style:
Выучить язык хорошо помогает всесторонний подход, поэтому я предлагаю совершенствовать грамматику, тренировать фонетику и произношение, читать и переводить, а главное разговаривать обо всем, что вас интересует и окружает. Мы можем использовать учебные пособия, художественную литературу, статьи из прессы, чтобы прорабатывать лексику и вводить ее в повседневную речь.

If you like and we can use student books, fiction, press articles to work out vocabulary and put it into everyday speech.

On peut parler de tout ce qui vous intéresse et vous entoure.

course_info.trial_description:
На этом уроке мы познакомимся, обсудим цели и задачи, постараемся составить план работы. 
Welcome friends! This lesson is for greetings and making plans. 
Bienvenue à tous! Dans cette leçon, nous nous rencontrerons et nous allons faire un plan.

pro_course_detail.title: Что новенького? / What's new? / Quoi de neuf?
pro_course_detail.description:
Давайте обсудим новости. Что интересного происходит в Вашей или моей стране, в мире? В ходе разговора, мы можем практиковать не только навыки общения, но и чтение (статьи), аудирование (видео, аудио).

Let's speak about something interesting in your life or about some news from social media. 

Bon commençons à discuter des nouvelles dans le monde ou dans votre vie.

pro_course_detail.title: Книжный клуб / Reading club/ Club de lecture
pro_course_detail.description:
Этот урок для тех, кто любит практиковать чтение и обсуждать прочитанное. Это может быть небольшой отрывок, стихотворение или заметка из журнальной статьи, но это так же может быть целое художественное произведение, если Вы берете цикл уроков. Чтение вслух помогает отработать произношение, а обсуждение - грамматику.
Please ask me! Пожалуйста, напишите мне сообщение, чтобы узнать об уже готовых курсах по чтению, возможно, там уже есть произведения, которые Вам интересны.

This lesson is for people who like reading, it helps to perfect pronunciation and grammar. We can translate and re-tell a short article, rhyme, or entire book (if you take a course of some lessons).

C’est une leçon pour ceux qui aiment lire. Nous pouvons traduire et faire le résumé des brèves histoires ou le livre en entier (si vous prenez un cours multi-leçons).

pro_course_detail.title: Письменный русский/ written Russian / écrivons en russe
pro_course_detail.description:
Если Вы хотите научиться оформлять свои мысли письменно (официальные письма, сочинения, творческие работы), Вы можете прислать мне черновик, я проверю, и на уроке мы вместе разберем ошибки в правописании и стилистике. 

I would be very pleased to help you with creative writing, essay, or formal letters. 

Je vous aiderai à corriger les erreurs grammaticales et stylistiques dans l’écriture.

teacher_info.intro:
Olá, pessoal! Me chamo Anita. Mas não sou a rainha do funk, talvez a rainha da língua russa (humilde, né?).

Sou da Bielorrússia, que é um lindo país no meio da Europa. Lá, terminei minha faculdade de letras e consegui minha especialização em lecionar russo como uma língua estrangeira.
Minhas experiências profissionais passam por lecionar na Universidade Técnica Nacional da Bielorrússia, em Minsk; Embaixada do Equador, na Bielorrússia; Cursos de idiomas presenciais e online.
No Brasil, estou situada em Belo Horizonte, uai... e posso dizer com certeza: Lecionar e pão de queijo são as duas maiores paixões que tenho na vida.

Vamos aprender russo juntos?
teacher_info.about_me:
Olá, pessoal! Me chamo Anita. Mas não sou a rainha do funk, talvez a rainha da língua russa (humilde, né?).

Sou da Bielorrússia, que é um lindo país no meio da Europa. Lá, terminei minha faculdade de letras e consegui minha especialização em lecionar russo como uma língua estrangeira.
Minhas experiências profissionais passam por lecionar na Universidade Técnica Nacional da Bielorrússia, em Minsk; Embaixada do Equador, na Bielorrússia; Cursos de idiomas presenciais e online.
No Brasil, estou situada em Belo Horizonte, uai... e posso dizer com certeza: Lecionar e pão de queijo são as duas maiores paixões que tenho na vida.

Vamos aprender russo juntos?
teacher_info.about_teacher:
Hello everyone!
My name is Anita. My biggest passion in life is learning and teaching languages. 
I'm a professional teacher of Russian, English and Portuguese languages for foreign students. But I concentrate mainly on teaching Russian language as I find it immensely interesting, fascinating and rewarding.
At my lessons even with beginners I try to use as much Russian words and phrases as possible, so one day without even noticing it you will be able to understand everything I say. That very day we will throw a big language party and review the case system of Russian language so to bring you down to earth a little bit ;)
teacher_info.teaching_style:
Concerning my methods, first of all it depends on your level of the language and the purpose of your learning, your interests and your age. The most important thing for me is to tailor my lessons in such a way that you will enjoy every second of it. 
My lessons are very well structured, they are all based around grammar. That helps a beginner to understand a system of a russian language and to get a better idea about how the language works. But of course, the main reason we all learn a foreign language is communication - so my main goal is to inspire you to use the language, to speak, to fall in love with it!

edu_info.major: Linguist, a teacher of two foreign languages (English and Spanish) and Russian as a foreign language

pro_course_detail.title: Russian language course (A1, A2, B1, B2, C1)
pro_course_detail.description: General Russian course includes well-planned and well-structured lessons for all levels of Russian, starting from A0 till C2. Every lesson contains  grammar , reading, speaking and listening practise. The materials I use  depend on a student's  level of the language and the purpose of learning, as well as interests and hobbies . The most important thing for me is to tailor my lessons in such a way that my students enjoy every second of it.

pro_course_detail.title: Survival Russian (Russian for traveling)
pro_course_detail.description: This course contains lessons that will help you to survive during your trip to Russia. They will help you learn how to read menu and order food in a restaurant or online, how to understand what an Uber driver asks you, how to buy museum , theatre or cinema tickets, how to ask for directions and not to get lost and many more.

pro_course_detail.title: Russian language course (A1, A2, B1, B2, C1) - 5 lessons
pro_course_detail.description: General Russian course includes well-planned and well-structured lessons for all levels of Russian, starting from A0 till C2. Every lesson contains  grammar , reading, speaking and listening practise. The materials I use  depend on a student's  level of the language and the purpose of learning, as well as interests and hobbies .

pro_course_detail.title: NEW STUDENTS (from September 2021) - Russian language course (A1, A2, B1, B2, C1)
pro_course_detail.description: General Russian course includes well-planned and well-structured lessons for all levels of Russian, starting from A0 till C2. Every lesson contains  grammar , reading, speaking and listening practise. The materials I use  depend on a student's  level of the language and the purpose of learning, as well as interests and hobbies . The most important thing for me is to tailor my lessons in such a way that my students enjoy every second of it.

teacher_info.intro:
Hi, Everyone! My name is Vladislav, and I am from Russia. I have a masters degree in Computer science. I have a strong passion for learning new things and teaching! My hobbies are learning new languages, programming, repairing computers and smartphones, watching movies in English, traveling and learning about other cultures, hiking.

Привет всем! Меня зовут Владислав, я из России. Закончил магистратуру по направлению Компьютерные науки. Люблю изучать все новое и преподавать! Мои хобби:  изучение новых языков, программирование, ремонт компьютеров и смартфонов, просмотр фильмов на английском языке, путешествия и изучение других культур, походы.
teacher_info.about_me:
Hi, Everyone! My name is Vladislav, and I am from Russia. I have a masters degree in Computer science. I have a strong passion for learning new things and teaching! My hobbies are learning new languages, programming, repairing computers and smartphones, watching movies in English, traveling and learning about other cultures, hiking.

Привет всем! Меня зовут Владислав, я из России. Закончил магистратуру по направлению Компьютерные науки. Люблю изучать все новое и преподавать! Мои хобби:  изучение новых языков, программирование, ремонт компьютеров и смартфонов, просмотр фильмов на английском языке, путешествия и изучение других культур, походы.
teacher_info.about_teacher:
I have experience working as a counselor in a children's camp. I am a patient, well-organized teacher with a simple and clear approach to learning Russian. Providing high-quality feedback on your strengths and areas for improvement is my trademark skill.

Работал вожатым в детском лагере . Я терпеливый, хорошо организованный преподаватель с простым и понятным подходом к изучению русского языка. Предоставляю качественную обратную связь с указанием сильных и слабых сторон.
teacher_info.teaching_style:
My main lessons are relaxed and conversation-based. Bring a notebook and a pencil, but maybe also a cup of coffee or tea. 
During our trial lesson, I will learn about you and your language goals. With this information, I will create lessons that will tailor towards your specific language goals.

Мои уроки проходят в формате легкой и непринужденной беседы. Если есть желание, то можно взять блокнот и ручку для записей, а также чашку кофе или чая.
Во время пробного урока мы поговорим о вас и ваших целях в изучении языка. Исходя из полученной информации, я буду планировать уроки, которые хорошо подойдут под ваши языковые цели.

course_info.trial_description:
In trial lessons, I want to tell you about myself and get to know you, as well! I also want to know about your learning goals and needs.

На пробном уроке мы познакомимся друг с другом! Также мы обсудим ваши цели и потребности в изучении языка.

pro_course_detail.title: Russian Conversation Practice - A1-C2
pro_course_detail.description:
Practice speaking about a variety of topics in Russian!

During the lesson, I will:
-Introduce you to new vocabulary, grammar structures, and native phrases.
-Correct your word choice and grammar.
-Help you with Russian Pronunciation and Accent.

We can decide on a topic together, or I can decide for you. Depending on your needs, the topics can be from basic level to more specific and advanced.

Вы научитесь общаться на различные темы по-русски!

Во время урока я буду:
- Знакомить вас с новой лексикой, грамматическими. структурами и фразами, которые используют носители языка.
- Исправлять грамматичсекие и синтаксические ошибки.
- Помогать с русским произношением и акцентом.

Мы можем выбрать тему для разговора вместе , или я могу выбрать её за вас. В зависимости от ваших потребностей или желаний, тема может быть от базового до продвинтутого уровня.

pro_course_detail.title: Pronunciation and Accent Training - A1-C2
pro_course_detail.description:
During this lesson, I will help you speak more clearly, naturally, and native-like. 

We will work specifically on:
- Standard Russian Accent
- Clear Pronunciation
- Natural Intonation
- How to sound like a Native Speaker.

We can use different written materials (beginner-advanced), through conversation topics, or anything else that you would like to learn with!

Я помогу тебе говорить на русском языке естественно и красиво!

Мы будем работать над:
- Стандартным Русским акцентом.
- Понятным произношением.
- Естесвенной интонацией.
- Звучанием как носитель языка.

Во время наших уроков мы можем использвать различные обучающие материалы (от начинающих до продвинутых) или материалы, по которым вы сами захотите изучать язык.

teacher_info.intro: Hello! I'm Andrew. I am a native Russian speaker. Currently, I live and study in Moscow. I study at Financial University. My major is an audit. My hobbies include playing guitar, writing music and learning languages. I am passionate about education as a process.
teacher_info.about_me: Hello! I'm Andrew. I am a native Russian speaker. Currently, I live and study in Moscow. I study at Financial University. My major is an audit. My hobbies include playing guitar, writing music and learning languages. I am passionate about education as a process.
teacher_info.about_teacher: I am a responsible and not indifferent teacher. I will set my lessons' materials looking at your goal.  My purpose is to make you relax and ready to communicate in Russian with a native speaker.
teacher_info.teaching_style:
My strategy depends on your goal as I said. You're not obligated to learn all grammar topics to speak the language and understand a speech. It is important to make studying an enjoyable process.
1. If you haven't learned any Russian or you know a couple of words it is better for you to take a beginner class. 
2. If you've studied some Russian and you can build some sentences and, for example, you know the Russian alphabet I recommend you to take an intermediate class. 
3. If you have already struggled with all Russian grammar, verbs of motion, therefore, you can speak this language and want just talk to a native speaker I'm all yours. So, I am waiting for you in an advanced class! 
See you!

course_info.trial_description: In this trial lesson, we will define your goals and set the most appropriate program for you. Also, define your wishes about materials which we will use.

pro_course_detail.title: For Beginners
pro_course_detail.description: This class has been prepared for people who haven't learned Russian before or who have learned only Cyrillic, for example, but didn't really jump into the grammar. Also, we will focus on your ability to speak from the very beginning creating basic dialogues and little sentences.

pro_course_detail.title: Let's talk!
pro_course_detail.description: Nothing really specific we will just talk as friends about everything you find interesting. I'm interested in music, learning languages, cultural differences, traveling and many more.

teacher_info.intro:
My humble YouTube channel: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCp0Ised2wgwvHU9gxp9p_-A

Hey! Looking for speaking practice with a native speaker and a professional linguist that will take your Russian to a whole new level? You're in the right place!
With me you can have natural, informative and stress-free conversations tailored to your interests—the ones that will definitely boost your vocabulary and self-confidence!
Let's smash that language barrier together!

Привет!
Если хочешь научиться уверенно говорить по-русски естественно и без стресса — добро пожаловать ко мне на урок!
Со мной твой русский выйдет на новый уровень, можешь мне поверить!
Давай преодолевать языковой барьер вместе!
teacher_info.short_signature: Professional linguist and translator with over 5 years of teaching experience!
teacher_info.about_me:
My humble YouTube channel: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCp0Ised2wgwvHU9gxp9p_-A

Hey! Looking for speaking practice with a native speaker and a professional linguist that will take your Russian to a whole new level? You're in the right place!
With me you can have natural, informative and stress-free conversations tailored to your interests—the ones that will definitely boost your vocabulary and self-confidence!
Let's smash that language barrier together!

Привет!
Если хочешь научиться уверенно говорить по-русски естественно и без стресса — добро пожаловать ко мне на урок!
Со мной твой русский выйдет на новый уровень, можешь мне поверить!
Давай преодолевать языковой барьер вместе!
teacher_info.about_teacher:
I will help you take it easy on learning Russian and just enjoy it! 
Apart from being a teacher for over 5 years now I have a master's degree in linguistics and translation so I can tell where different mistakes come from and convert them into natural Russian expressions. 
By the way, I'm a student myself (Spanish, yay!) so I know how you feel, believe me. Also looking at Arabic, Greek, Chinese, Turkish… so if you have any experience with those I'll be happy to hear about it!
teacher_info.teaching_style: I have an easy-going teaching style and approach my students in a respectful and encouraging way, as a good friend would. I might occasionally introduce them to some grammar or some cultural aspects, but I never force things because, first of all, language should be fun!

course_info.trial_description:
Если ты все еще боишься, что я кусаюсь - заходи сюда :)
If you're still afraid that I might bite - welcome here :)

pro_course_detail.title: 📗 🗣️ Давайте говорить! Let's speak! 🗣️ 📗  B1-C2 ONLY ❗❗
pro_course_detail.description:
❗❗ Hey! Gotcha! Are you sure your level is at least B1, that is you can read in Russian and express yourself in basic sentences? 
If so, then welcome!👍

Just trying to tell that conversational classes are NOT for complete beginners, sorry guys 🙁

But with the brave and seasoned A2+ students, we're going to talk on various topics from knitting to global warming and whatnot! Come and join me - I don't bite! haha

The duration of the class is 55 minutes for me to make some tea between the classes.
See, I'm a true tea fan :)

Здесь мы будем разговаривать на различные темы - от вязания до проблемы глобального потепления! Будет весело - заходи, я не кусаюсь!
Занятие идет 55 минут, чтобы я успевала заваривать чай между уроками.
Да, я очень люблю чай :)

pro_course_detail.title: 🏁  🇷🇺  Russian conversational basics (A1-A2) 🇷🇺   🏁

teacher_info.intro: ЗДРАВСТВУЙТЕ 😊!  Olá! Hello! I'm Victoria. I am a native Russian speaker and a  professional Russian teacher from Sochi (Russia).  I love my job and the opportunities to meet my students from all over the World 🌏!
teacher_info.short_signature: Learning Russian? Up for a challenge? Learning Russian can be fun and interesting!
teacher_info.about_me: ЗДРАВСТВУЙТЕ 😊!  Olá! Hello! I'm Victoria. I am a native Russian speaker and a  professional Russian teacher from Sochi (Russia).  I love my job and the opportunities to meet my students from all over the World 🌏!
teacher_info.about_teacher:
My lessons will help you to learn and use Russian in a real life!
Only when Information combined with emotions becomes a long-term memory and the best result!
teacher_info.teaching_style:
My classes focus on NATIVE Russian, depending on your interests and goals. Here's what you can get:
✔️communication in Russian in real-life contexts 
✔️we speak through the whole class with the help of a specially designed platform which allows to practice all necessary skills, and to keep in mind everything said, read, heard or seen; 
✔️speaking 85 %, reading, writing and listening skills
✔️ all extra materials for free.

edu_info.major: System and methodology of teaching Russian as foreign language
edu_info.description: Teaching Russian as a Foreign Language (RFL).

edu_info.major: Teaching Russian as a Foreign Language (RFL).
edu_info.description: Teaching Russian as a Foreign Language (RFL). System and methodology of teaching Russian to foreigners

cert_info.description: System and methodology of teaching Russian to foreigners
cert_info.certificate: Teaching Russian as a Foreign Language (RFL).

course_info.trial_description: Take a trial lesson with me to discuss  your learning goals and interests. This lesson is important, as it is in this lesson that we get to know one another and look to see whether we can work well together. We will discuss your main goals and learning difficulties. In addition to this, it is during this time that I may determine your level.

pro_course_detail.title: Russian for beginners
pro_course_detail.description:
These lessons are  for those who starts learning Russian and would like to study the basics.
My lessons will help you to learn basic vocabulary and grammar, fine-tune your pronunciation and get essential language skills in Russian. From daily greetings to basic expressions, learn Russian the simple and fun way with my help!

pro_course_detail.title: Intensive Russian
pro_course_detail.description:
Expand your vocabulary.
Use essential everyday vocabulary in simple dialogues in Russian.
Practice reading, listening and comprehending spoken Russian.
Have fun discovering major differences and oddities of the Russian language compared to English.
Learn and practice basic grammar: genders of nouns, conjugation of adjectives and verbs.

pro_course_detail.title: Russian for intermediate
pro_course_detail.description: In this lesson, we will work on expanding your vocabulary and improving your grammar, so you can take part in a conversation easily. We will read articles, watch videos, listen to podcasts and then discuss them. The topics depends on your personal interests and goals.

teacher_info.intro: My name is Muslim, I am a native Russian speaker from Kazakhstan which is the second largest Russian speaking country and the 9th largest country in the world (by territory). Teaching rich and beautiful Russian language is my passion and one of my favorite things to do! I have a Bachelor's in Biotech and worked with websites (PHP, JS, MySQL etc.), so, I like to discuss these subjects. I also enjoy talking about video games, business, travel, movies, science - you name it! I am a foreign languages enthusiast as well. I studied German in high school and I know a little French. I know how challenging it is to study a foreign language and I am here to help improve your Russian.
teacher_info.short_signature: Turning Russian learners into Russian speakers! More than 4y of experience, Advanced English speaker
teacher_info.introduction: Happy to meet you! I am your Russian language teacher! And I am probably the best iTalki tutor for you, here is why. I like to help foreign students to learn such a beautiful and rich language as Russian, in practice, through real conversations. Here on iTalki we are going to improve your Russian language conversation skills and vocabulary. You will understand more not only about language, but also about traditions, culture, people and their way of life in Russian-speaking countries. My teaching style is informal, so that you can feel comfortable and speak with me as if it is a casual conversation and you are talking to your friend, or colleague, or brother. During our conversations we can discuss any topic you choose, so our lessons are going to be interesting and more efficient! Because once the information is interesting for you, it is easier to remember and use new words and expressions. So try to consider my lessons as a captivating game or a wonderful conversation and I guarantee that the Russian language learning process will not be boring. It will have a lot of fun and you won't even notice that your language skills are already upgraded to a new level! Привет, меня зовут Муслим. Я ваш учитель русского и я счастлив возможности помочь вам в изучении этого красивого и богатого языка! В ходе наших занятий, я помогу вам улучшить ваши разговорные навыки, произношение, выучить новые слова и выражения. Вы узнаете много нового не только о самом языке, но и о традициях, культуре и быте людей, проживающих в русскоязычных странах. Мне нравится помогать иностранцам в изучении русского языка и я постараюсь, чтобы в ходе занятий вы чувствовали себя максимально комфортно и воспринимали уроки, как приятную и непринуждённую беседу с другом, коллегой или братом. Этот факт поможет вам запомнить больше новых слов и выражений и вы даже не заметите как ваши навыки русского повысились до нового уровня! Скоро увидимся на моём уроке! See you soon at my lesson!
teacher_info.about_me: My name is Muslim, I am a native Russian speaker from Kazakhstan which is the second largest Russian speaking country and the 9th largest country in the world (by territory). Teaching rich and beautiful Russian language is my passion and one of my favorite things to do! I have a Bachelor's in Biotech and worked with websites (PHP, JS, MySQL etc.), so, I like to discuss these subjects. I also enjoy talking about video games, business, travel, movies, science - you name it! I am a foreign languages enthusiast as well. I studied German in high school and I know a little French. I know how challenging it is to study a foreign language and I am here to help improve your Russian.
teacher_info.about_teacher: I have a huge experience in helping English speakers to learn Russian through real, everyday conversations. I started practicing active language partnership when I was a university student, actively communicating with exchange students from English speaking countries and translating English lectures into Russian. That's how I learned about the nuances of teaching Russian and got my first experience. I am regularly practicing my English with natives, so I can easily help students of any language level. My Bachelor's degree in Biotechnology and working experience in Web Development allow me to help Russian learners with specific technical and scientific terminology.
teacher_info.teaching_style: I am flexible & easy-going. We can work on your language skills, or if you are fluent enough I can provide the freedom to choose a conversation topic, so that we can discuss anything you would like to. My English is very good (advanced level). I can explain the meaning of complicated words, definitions or grammar rules. Unfortunately, I have had quite a few students cancel their lessons at the last minute, and I am now having to implement a Cancellation Policy. If you give 24 hours notice of cancellation then you will not be charged and the lesson can be rescheduled but if you give less than 24 hours notice then we will be unable to rearrange the lesson, but the lesson will still be charged.

course_info.trial_description:
Привет! Do you lack confidence speaking Russian? Do you want to make less mistakes during a conversation? Do you have a Russian speaking girlfriend or boyfriend, but keep on using English when talk to her/him? Are you going to visit one of the many Russian speaking countries and want to learn more basic phrases or words? Do you think you need to work on your pronunciation so that you'll be better understood? Do you want to watch Russian movies or TV series without translation? Are you an advanced Russian speaker and just would like to hone your conversational skills? Or you just simply love Russian language and want to learn more about Russian culture, traditions, people?

If you have answered "yes" to any of the above questions, then please be the next "guest" at my Late Night Russian School! Introduce yourself and let's be friends! Don't be afraid of making mistakes, because it is natural while you are learning any foreign language. During our classes, I will teach you new vocabulary, phrases and words. We can discuss lots of different topics including Economics, Travel, Culture, Languages, Science and Technology, Sport, Business, History, Movies etc. Увидимся в классе!

pro_course_detail.title: Russian Conversation Practice - fun chats and enjoyable conversations in a friendly atmosphere! Практика разговорного русского - весёлая болтовня и занимательные беседы в непринуждённой атмосфере!
pro_course_detail.description:
Привет! You are already an Intermediate|Upper-Intermediate|Advanced level Russian learner (B, C), but you don't have enough confidence speaking Russian? Do you want to make less mistakes during a conversation? Do you have a Russian speaking girlfriend or boyfriend, but keep on using English when talk to her/him? Are you going to visit one of the many Russian speaking countries and want to learn more basic phrases or words? Do you think you need to work on your pronunciation so that you'll be better understood? Do you want to watch Russian movies or TV series without translation? Are you an advanced Russian speaker and just would like to hone your conversational skills? Or you just simply love Russian language and want to learn more about Russian culture, traditions, people?

If you have answered "yes" to any of the above questions, then please be a student of my Russian Language School on italki! Introduce yourself and let's be friends! Don't be afraid of making mistakes, because it is natural while you are learning any foreign language. During our classes, I will teach you new vocabulary, phrases and words. We can discuss lots of different topics including Economics, Travel, Culture, Languages, Science and Technology, Sport, Business, History, Movies etc. Увидимся в классе!

pro_course_detail.title: Russian for Beginners (or Elementary level) | Русский для начинающих
pro_course_detail.description:
Hello dear students! Please book this lesson if you are a beginner or pre-intermediate level Russian learner. Depending on your level of language skills and learning goals, we'll improve your vocabulary and develop your reading, writing, pronunciation abilities by doing exercises, reading texts and learning new words and phrases. See you in the class!

Дорогие студенты! Пожалуйста заказывайте этот урок, если вы начинающий студент (A level). В зависимости от вашего уровня владения языковыми навыками и целями изучения языка, мы с вами улучшим ваш словарный запас и будем развивать ваши навыки чтения, написания текстов, произношение, выполняя упражнения, читая тексты и изучая новые слова и фразы. Увидимся на занятии!

teacher_info.intro:
Привет! Меня зовут Мария, я из Украины. На данный момент живу в Барселоне. Мне нравится спорт, путешествия и изучение языков. 

Hola! Me llamo Mariia, soy de Ucrania pero actualmente vivo en Barcelona. Me gusta hacer deporte, viajar y aprender idiomas.

Hey! My name is Mariia, I’m from Ukraine but I currently live in Barcelona. I like to do sport, to travel and to learn languages.
teacher_info.about_me:
Привет! Меня зовут Мария, я из Украины. На данный момент живу в Барселоне. Мне нравится спорт, путешествия и изучение языков. 

Hola! Me llamo Mariia, soy de Ucrania pero actualmente vivo en Barcelona. Me gusta hacer deporte, viajar y aprender idiomas.

Hey! My name is Mariia, I’m from Ukraine but I currently live in Barcelona. I like to do sport, to travel and to learn languages.
teacher_info.about_teacher:
Моими родными языками являются русский и украинский. Говорю по-испански, по-английски и нахожусь в процессе изучения японского и каталонского. 

Hablo ruso, ucraniano, inglés, español y estoy aprendiendo japonés y catalán. Me gustaría aprender más idiomas. 

I speak Russian, Ukrainian, Spanish, English and I'm learning Japanese and Catalan. I would like to learn more languages.
teacher_info.teaching_style:
Мой стиль преподавания активный, а занятия динамичные и сконцентрированные на потребностях ученика. Увидимся на занятии! 

Mis clases son dinámicas y centradas en lo que el alumno necesita. Nos vemos pronto! 

My classes are dynamic and centred on my student's needs. See you soon!

course_info.trial_description: Do you want to improve your conversation skills? Are you interested in putting your learnt knowledge into practice? Then book a lesson! These lessons will be very casual and customized for you.

pro_course_detail.title: Русский язык (полноценное занятие)/ General Russian
pro_course_detail.description:
Do you want to improve your reading, writing and/or pronunciation skills? Then book a general lesson! These lessons will be more structured than my conversation practice lessons. 
- Speaking together to improve vocabulary and fluency
- Making homework together
- Studying and practising grammar together
- Practicing reading and writing

pro_course_detail.title: Разговорная практика/Conversation Practice
pro_course_detail.description: Do you want to improve your conversation skills? Are you interested in putting your learnt knowledge into practice? Then book a lesson! These lessons will be very casual and customized for you.

pro_course_detail.title: Русский язык для детей/Russian for kids
pro_course_detail.description: Fun and vibrant class which will be focused on increasing the student's confidence and knowledge of Russian

teacher_info.intro:
Hi!

My name is Julia✨ I was born in Russia. 
I like travelling and camping so much✈🎒 I lived in different contries, in the mountains, in forests and near the ocean, our world is really fantastic!
Also I like learning different languages. Russian is my native language, I know English and now I'm learning French and Italian, so I undersand all the problems and difficulties during studying a language.
teacher_info.short_signature: I love dogs, travelling and learning languages:) You're always welcome!
teacher_info.about_me:
Hi!

My name is Julia✨ I was born in Russia. 
I like travelling and camping so much✈🎒 I lived in different contries, in the mountains, in forests and near the ocean, our world is really fantastic!
Also I like learning different languages. Russian is my native language, I know English and now I'm learning French and Italian, so I undersand all the problems and difficulties during studying a language.
teacher_info.about_teacher: I am a proffessional teacher of English language for Russian young learners (for more than 7 years) and a teacher of Russian as a foreign language. Now I am studying at the State University at the Pedagogical Faculty. Also I study Psychology all the time, that's why I teach languages based on knowledge in this sphere.
teacher_info.teaching_style:
We will talk a lot and discuss all the difficulties you have📚
I have different formats: Russian for Begginers, Basic Russian for all and Conversation Practice (we will discuss the topics you want).

course_info.trial_description: This is a trial lesson for you! We can discuss any topic you want or just speak Russian. I'll give you all the actual information about Russian language and about our lessons!

pro_course_detail.title: Basic Russian for Intermediate/Advanced students
pro_course_detail.description: During these lessons we will discuss more difficult rules and topics than on the lessons for Begginers. Also it can be a specialized/professional Russian for work/studies/etc.

pro_course_detail.title: Conversational Russian
pro_course_detail.description: In this lesson we can have conversations in Russian about any topic you like. I'll help you with all the difficulties (new vocabulary, grammar). Your speaking and listenning skills will improve a lot!

teacher_info.intro:
Всем привет!
Меня зовут Елизавета и я очень рада приветствовать всех, кто интересуется иностранными языками - хочет развиваться и совершенствоваться! Я, как выпускница, одного из лучших педагогических университетов в России и просто как человек, любящий иностранные языки как и каждый из вас, помогу вам усовершенствовать ваши знания в дружелюбной и комфортной обстановке! =)
Hello everyone!
My name is Elizabeth and I am very glad to welcome everyone who is interested in foreign languages ​​- wants to develop and improve! I invite you to join me and go on this exciting journey together!
teacher_info.about_me:
Всем привет!
Меня зовут Елизавета и я очень рада приветствовать всех, кто интересуется иностранными языками - хочет развиваться и совершенствоваться! Я, как выпускница, одного из лучших педагогических университетов в России и просто как человек, любящий иностранные языки как и каждый из вас, помогу вам усовершенствовать ваши знания в дружелюбной и комфортной обстановке! =)
Hello everyone!
My name is Elizabeth and I am very glad to welcome everyone who is interested in foreign languages ​​- wants to develop and improve! I invite you to join me and go on this exciting journey together!
teacher_info.about_teacher:
Сдала экзамен TestDaf 2019 году на уровень C1. На данный момент работаю также на курсах преподавателем немецкого языка, также преподаю русский язык как носитель языка. Обожаю этот язык и постоянно совершенствую свои знания, регулярно общаясь с носителями языка, принимая участие в обменах и конференциях в Германии и Австрии. Помогу вам полюбить этот язык и усовершенствовать свои знания!
Passed 2019 TestDaf exam at level C1. At the moment, I also work as a German language teacher on courses, and also teach Russian as a native speaker. I love this language and constantly improve my knowledge, regularly communicating with native speakers, taking part in exchanges and conferences in Germany.
teacher_info.teaching_style:
На своих уроках использую коммуникативную методику. Также интерактивные приложения, аудио и видео - материалы, интересные и яркие раздаточные материалы. На занятиях делается упор на разговорную практику, в зависимости от индивидуальных потребностей студентов.  На занятиях царит
непринужденная, дружелюбная и доверительная атмосфера.
In my lessons I use a communicative approach. Also interactive applications, audio and video materials, interesting and vivid handouts. The class focuses on speaking practice, depending on the individual needs of the students. In the classroom reigns relaxed, friendly and confidential atmosphere.

course_info.trial_description:
Пробный урок/Probestunde
Пробный урок включает в себя знакомство,  разговорную практику для определения уровня.
Die Probestunde enthält Bekanntschaft und Konversation um das Sprachneveau zu bestimmen.

pro_course_detail.title: Разговорная практика для взрослых
pro_course_detail.description: Данный курс рассчитан на людей, желающих расширить словарный запас, улучшить произношение и приобрести легкость в общении на иностранном языке. Будем обсуждать разные темы и учить новые слова:)

pro_course_detail.title: Allgemeiner Deutschkurs
pro_course_detail.description: Der Kurs zielt auf die Entwicklung von Sprachkompetenzen ab: Hören, Sprechen, Lesen, Aussprache inszenieren. In diesem Kurs arbeiten wir mit authentischen deutschen Materialien, wobei wir auch auf Grammatik und Wortschatz achten.

pro_course_detail.title: Konversation
pro_course_detail.description: In diesem Kurs konzentrieren wir uns auf die gesprochene Sprache. Sie wählen die Themen. Wir diskutieren verschiedene Themen und erweitern unseren Wortschatz.

pro_course_detail.title: Vorbereitung auf internationale Prüfungen
pro_course_detail.description: Dieser Prüfungskurs konzentriert sich auf die Vorbereitung auf internationale Prüfungen. Im Unterricht analysieren wir die Prüfungsaufgaben: Aufbau und Inhalt. Der Schwerpunkt liegt auf dem mündlichen Teil. Mach dich bereit für deine Hausaufgaben :)

teacher_info.intro: I am a professional teacher of Russian and English, I was raised and lived in Moscow, Russia. I’m currently based in Europe. I have a bachelor's degree in Education from Moscow State Pedagogical University. Been teaching in classrooms since 2017 and online since May 2021. Currently I'm based in Spain.
teacher_info.short_signature: Learn Russian with a professional native speaker teacher!
teacher_info.about_me: I am a professional teacher of Russian and English, I was raised and lived in Moscow, Russia. I’m currently based in Europe. I have a bachelor's degree in Education from Moscow State Pedagogical University. Been teaching in classrooms since 2017 and online since May 2021. Currently I'm based in Spain.
teacher_info.about_teacher:
I’m an inspiring and supportive teacher. 

My aim is to encourage you to speak as much your target language, building your confidence and fluency in an enjoyable environment. 

I will help you to take your skills to the next level whether you need it for traveling, your work, meeting a foreign partner, immigration, or any other purpose.

Can’t wait to meet you!
teacher_info.teaching_style:
Languages and teaching are my two passions. I believe that knowing a second language can give you lots of opportunities!

In the first lesson, we will talk about your language goals. For every lesson, I prepare topics and the studying materials based on your needs. We will mostly speak in your target language. I will speak at your pace.

!!!A lesson can only be canceled or rescheduled 24 hours before the lesson start time!!!

Привет! 
Меня зовут Гули! Я живу в Европе три года. Обучаю русскому и английскому языкам.  Я предлагаю вам свой профессионализм, душевность и приятную атмосферу в изучении языка.

course_info.trial_description: An easy introduction where we can get to know each other before starting our regular lessons. During the conversation I’ll also ask you your learning preferences and goals and a bit about your life and interests. I will also demonstrate you a sample of a lesson

pro_course_detail.title: Intermediate - Advanced
pro_course_detail.description:
In these lessons we're going to speak Russian.
I'll activate your speaking skills if you're already speaking Russian a little bit. During the conversation, you'll feel more confident in your language skills and you begin to express your thoughts more freely. Also, I'll correct your most common grammar and pronunciation mistakes and explain to you how to avoid them in the future. 
With my help we will bring your speaking skills to the next level!
Feel free to send me a message or book a trial lesson if you'd like to know more.

pro_course_detail.title: Russian - Begginer - Intemediate
pro_course_detail.description: Whether you’re just starting your Russian language journey from scratch or you’re already a beginner, I can help you to build and improve the basic skills quickly and efficiently.

teacher_info.intro:
My name is Olga and i am an experienced Russian language tutor! I am a native Russian language speaker! Now i live in Moscow.
I really enjoy learning foreign languages and,of course, i really enjoy teaching Russian! Its my work, hobby and passion!
I teach Russian to people with different levels of language proficiency!
teacher_info.about_me:
My name is Olga and i am an experienced Russian language tutor! I am a native Russian language speaker! Now i live in Moscow.
I really enjoy learning foreign languages and,of course, i really enjoy teaching Russian! Its my work, hobby and passion!
I teach Russian to people with different levels of language proficiency!
teacher_info.about_teacher:
I have 2 years of experience of being private Russian language teacher. I taught both online and offline.
My method of teaching is based on practice and well structured material. The programme will depend on your interests and needs 📚
If you are at the very beginning of the study, I will help you not to get lost in the huge volume of new words and constructions, but to follow a clear and effective plan 📈
I want to share with you Russian culture, traditions and of course, teach you Russian!
I try to make my lessons varied and interesting!😄
teacher_info.teaching_style:
We can concentrate on speaking practice and talk about everything you`re interested in. I can help you to improve your grammar and pronunciation as well as expand your vocabulary.
I will help you not to get lost in the huge volume of new words and constructions, but to follow a clear and effective plan.
We can focus on certain aspects. I will assist you with improving your writing, reading or listening skills. Everything depends on your goals and wishes!😊
Usually i teach using my favourite Russian language textbooks and of course i have an additional materials :)

course_info.trial_description:
I try to make my lessons varied and interesting!
We can focus on certain aspects. The programme will depend on your interests and needs!

pro_course_detail.title: Conversation Russian
pro_course_detail.description: We can concentrate on speaking practice and talk about everything you`re interested in. I can help you to improve your pronunciation as well as expand your vocabulary. I can choose the exercises that will meet your level of language, aimed at improving speaking skills :)

pro_course_detail.title: General Russian
pro_course_detail.description:
We can focus on certain aspects. I will assist you with improving your writing, reading or listening skills. During the lesson we will do different exercises, study new grammar, learn new words and of course try to converse on various topics in Russian! I will teach you the most common words, expressions and idioms!
Also, we can read Russian classic, like Dostoevsky, Tolstoy together in class!

teacher_info.intro:
Люблю всё красивое! Красоту природы, красоту музыки, красоту слова, красоту души.
I love everything beautiful! The beauty of nature, the beauty of music, the beauty of the word, the beauty of the soul. 
私は美しさが大好きです！ 自然の美しさや音楽の美しさや言葉の美しさや魂の美しさなどです。

You can see examples of my lessons here: https://youtu.be/J1mQsHpv_6A
teacher_info.about_me:
Люблю всё красивое! Красоту природы, красоту музыки, красоту слова, красоту души.
I love everything beautiful! The beauty of nature, the beauty of music, the beauty of the word, the beauty of the soul. 
私は美しさが大好きです！ 自然の美しさや音楽の美しさや言葉の美しさや魂の美しさなどです。

You can see examples of my lessons here: https://youtu.be/J1mQsHpv_6A
teacher_info.about_teacher:
Стараюсь к каждому студенту найти индивидуальный подход.
I try to find an individual approach to each student.
学生に個別のアプローチを見つけようとしています。

私はコミュニカティブアプローチを使っています。
レッスンはロシア語で行われています。
私の目標は：あなたはロシアのスピーチと精神が了解できて、ロシア語が話せるのことが手伝いたいです。
最初のレッスンからあなたはロシアのスピーチを聞いて、ロシアで会話に参加しています。
先生のスピーチを了解していない心配しないでください。
そのクラスはロシアのアルファベットを見たことがない人にとっても適しています。
クラスでは、教科書やテキストやオーディオおよびビデオの資料などを使用しています。レッスンを楽しく思い出深いものに作るために最善を尽くします。現在、私は一般ロシア語のレッスン（0  -  B1レベル、大人です）と会話練習（A2  -  C2レベル）のお申し出をすることができます。 
残念ですが、私はビジネスのためのロシア語をお申し出をすることはできません。
***
レッスンの詳細を話し合わせるように、事前に書いてください。
***
もしあなたはPC、ラップトップまたはタブレットを使うと、レッスンはより効果的です。
***
宿題をできるのことを準備してください。 宿題は外国語学習でたいせつなことです。
***
ロシア語のレッスンへ歓迎です。＼(￣▽￣)／
teacher_info.teaching_style:
I’m using communicative language teaching. The lesson is conducted in Russian. My goal is to help you understand Russian speech, Russian mentality and to help speak Russian. From first lesson you are listen Russian speech and participate in conversation in Russian. Don’t be afraid do not understand teacher’s speech. My classes are suitable even for those who for the first time in his life sees the Russian alphabet. I do my best to make the lesson fun and memorable.
Now I can offer you General Russian lessons for adults (0 – B1 level) and Conversation Practice (A2 – C2 level). 
Please, write me in advance about your goals, so I’ll can make the lesson more useful for you.

cert_info.institution: Moscow State University Russian Language Centre
cert_info.certificate: Teacher of Russian as a Foreign Languages

course_info.trial_description:
The trial lesson usually helps me understand your language level (approximately) and how I can be useful for you.  Of course, if you would want offer interesting for you topic for trial lesson, I will happy and so I will prepare materials for your needs.
トライアルレッスンで私はあなたのロシア語レベルが了解できます。そして私はあなたにとってどのように役立つことができるかを理解することができます。もし何かトピックに興味があるなら、教えてください。そうなら、私は資料を準備します。

pro_course_detail.title: Conversational Practice 会話練習
pro_course_detail.description:
Let’s speak Russian! Tell me, please, what about would you want speak, what vocabulary or what kind of grammar would you want to train? I will use it when we will talk. Or, maybe, you would like free talk about anything.  
Don’t worry if you just beginner. I will speak as slowly as you need, use simple grammar and words.
ロシア語を話しましょう！ ＼(￣▽￣)／
何についてお話したいですか、教えてください。どんな言葉や文法などを会話で練習したいですか。それを会話の中で使います。
または、多分、あなたは何でも自由に話をしたいです。
初心者だけが心配しないでください。私はあなたが必要とするのと同じくらいゆっくり話し、単純な文法と言葉を使います。

pro_course_detail.title: General Russian - 初級ロシア語
pro_course_detail.description:
In these lessons we learn speaking, writing, listening, reading.
I would be happy if you agreed to do homework and send me to check. Contribution time for the homework is lead to the progress in learning a foreign language.
Please, write me in advance about your goals and your wishes, so I’ll can make the lesson more useful for you.
これらのレッスンでは私たちは話したり、書いたり、聞いたり、読んだりします。
あなたが宿題を行なうことに同意して私へチェックのために送ることに同意したならば、私はうれしくなります。 宿題の貢献時間は、外国語を学ぶことの進歩につながります。
ご目標とお願いについて前に私に書いてください。

pro_course_detail.title: Students before 1 May 2022
pro_course_detail.description:
Learn speaking, writing, listening, reading.
これらのレッスンでは話したり、書いたり、聞いたり、読んだりします。
あなたが宿題を行なうことに同意して私へチェックのために送ることに同意したならば、私はうれしくなります。 宿題の貢献時間は、外国語を学ぶことの進歩につながります。
ご目標とお願いについて前に私に書いてください。

teacher_info.intro:
Me considero una persona curiosa y amigable. Me gusta conocer gente nueva, hacer amigos y conocer nuevas culturas, cosa que creo que nos enriquece a todos enormemente. Una de mis pasiones, además de los idiomas, es viajar, algo que me ha abierto muchísimo la mente al haber podido descubrir otros lugares, otros sabores y otras formas de vivir.

I consider myself a curious, friendly person. I like meeting new people, making friends, and getting to know other cultures, something that enriches all of us. One of my passions, besides languages, is traveling. Being able to discover other places, flavours, and ways of living opened my mind a lot.
teacher_info.about_me:
Me considero una persona curiosa y amigable. Me gusta conocer gente nueva, hacer amigos y conocer nuevas culturas, cosa que creo que nos enriquece a todos enormemente. Una de mis pasiones, además de los idiomas, es viajar, algo que me ha abierto muchísimo la mente al haber podido descubrir otros lugares, otros sabores y otras formas de vivir.

I consider myself a curious, friendly person. I like meeting new people, making friends, and getting to know other cultures, something that enriches all of us. One of my passions, besides languages, is traveling. Being able to discover other places, flavours, and ways of living opened my mind a lot.
teacher_info.about_teacher:
He trabajado como profesora de español tanto en academias como en línea, y he organizado cursos de conversación, de juegos de mesa, etcétera. También tengo experiencia como examinadora DELE. Me encanta aprender, por lo que estoy en constante formación.

I have worked as a Spanish teacher at either in-person or online academies, and I have organized conversation and board games courses. I also own experience as a DELE examiner. I love learning, so that keeps in constant training.
teacher_info.teaching_style:
Mis lecciones están enfocadas totalmente en el estudiante para que se pueda comunicar sin ningún problema. Para ello intento crear una atmósfera amigable y utilizo materiales interesantes: series, películas, libros, etcétera. En cuanto a la preparación de exámenes oficiales, tengo a mi disposición los manuales más actualizados con los que ya he trabajado.

My lessons are fully student-centered so that they will be able to communicate without any problems. For that, I intend to create a kind atmosphere, and I use exciting materials: series, films, books, etc. Regarding the preparation for the official exams, I have available the most updadated manuals with which I have already worked.

edu_info.institution: Universidad Estatal de Pedagogía de Berdyansk

edu_info.major: Estudios Superiores de la Lengua Española

cert_info.certificate: Curso de acreditación de examinadores DELE A1-A2
Curso de acreditación de examinadores DELE B1-B2

pro_course_detail.title: ¡Disfruta de las series!
pro_course_detail.description:
¿Quieres aprender español a través de tus series favoritas? Elige esta opción y podremos hablar sobre los capítulos a la vez que aprendemos vocabulario, frases hechas y cultura de España. ¿Quién dijo que un idioma fuese aburrido? :)

Would you like to learn Spanish through your favourite series? Choose this option, and we will talk about the episodes as we learn vocabulary, idioms and Spanish culture. Who said that learning a language was boring? :)

pro_course_detail.title: Curso general estructurado
pro_course_detail.description:
En este curso aprenderás las bases del idioma mediante libros y todo tipo de materiales: vocabulario, audiciones, vídeos, tareas, práctica de conversación, etcétera. Tendrás todo a tu disposición con un estilo que te permitirá darte cuenta de tu progreso rápidamente. ¿No sabes nada del idioma o nunca lo has estudiado antes? ¡No es un problema! ¡Aprendamos juntos! :)

In this course, you will learn the bases of the language employing books and all types of materials: vocabulary, audio files, videos, homework, conversation practise, etcetera. You will have everything at hand with a style that will help you notice your progress quickly. Don't you know anything about the language or haven't you ever studied it? Not a problem at all! Let's learn! :)

pro_course_detail.title: Objetivo DELE
pro_course_detail.description:
Prepárate de la mejor forma para el examen DELE con este curso en el que aprenderás las técnicas fundamentales para la prueba además del vocabulario necesario. Además, como examinadora, podré evaluar si estás ya preparado para aprobar.

Get prepared for the DELE test in the best way using this course. You will learn the fundamental techniques for the examination as well as the necessary vocabulary. Besides, as an examinator myself, I will be able to evaluate you and see if you are ready to pass.

pro_course_detail.title: Ruso para hispanohablantes
pro_course_detail.description:
Si eres hispanohablante y estás interesado en la bella lengua rusa, no esperes más y practica conmigo. Podremos charlar de diferentes temas o incluso resolver tus dudas sobre Ucrania o Rusia. :)

If you are a Spanish speaker and are interested in the beautiful Russian language, do not hesitate more and practice with me. We can chat about different topics or even solve your doubts about Ukraine or Russia. :)

teacher_info.intro:
hi there))
I'm Ksenia from Russia!)
I'm fun, supportive and I have a degree in linguistics so I know some stuff about learning languages)
by the way, I have a telegram channel about russian language^^   t.me/RussianWithKseniaRazuvaeva
teacher_info.about_me:
hi there))
I'm Ksenia from Russia!)
I'm fun, supportive and I have a degree in linguistics so I know some stuff about learning languages)
by the way, I have a telegram channel about russian language^^   t.me/RussianWithKseniaRazuvaeva
teacher_info.about_teacher:
I want to help you to improve your language skills, to feel confident  speaking ^^
You don't need to worry about mistakes, just relax and let the conversation go)))))
teacher_info.teaching_style:
Я хочу помочь вам с изучением русского языка, помочь почувствовать себя уверенно в разговоре.
Вам не нужно переживать об ошибках, всё, что вам нужно - это веселиться и говорить!

course_info.trial_description: We can talk about anything you want but if you feel shy or have no idea what to say - don't warry I have tons of interesting activities up my sleeve :))

pro_course_detail.title: Conversational practice/Разговорная практика
pro_course_detail.description:
We can talk about anything you want but if you feel shy or have no idea what to say - don't worry I have tons of interesting activities up my sleeve :))

Мы можем говорить на любые темы, которые вам интересны, а так же у меня есть разные интересные задания)

pro_course_detail.title: Grammar and Vocabulary Lesson
pro_course_detail.description:
Vocabulary and constructions of real everyday russian language.
We might use a textbook if needed but my approach is based on authentic dialogs.
